column4: because of her weird powers. But Tip frankly hated her

column7: considering she was his guardian.There were pumpkins in Mombi's corn-fields
column8: lying golden red among the rows of green stalks; and these had been planted and carefully tended that the four-horned cow might eat of them in the winter time. But one day
column9: after the corn had all been cut and stacked
column10: and Tip was carrying the pumpkins to the stable
column11: he took a notion to make a "Jack Lantern" and try to give the old woman a fright with it.So he selected a fine
column13: orange-red color—and began carving it. With the point of his knife he made two round eyes
column15: and a mouth shaped like a new moon.
